{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
constexpr basic_string_view&amp; operator=( const basic_string_view&amp; view ) noexcept = default;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Replaces the view with that of {{c|view}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|view|view to copy}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;

int main()
{
    std::string_view v = "Hello, world";
    v = v.substr(7);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; v &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
world
}}
